data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3578435,"name":"M","username":"Mako","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mako/{size}/270886_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-02T22:32:58.951Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHi \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCD\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Chief Delphi\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, my team is looking to buy motor controllers for our Neo swerve, and we saw that \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eTTB\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"The Thrifty Bot\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e Nova’s were cheaper and maybe more durable than Spark Maxes. I wanted to know if anyone has used them in their robot yet and any comments on them.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-04-02T22:32:58.951Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":19,"reads":372,"readers_count":371,"score":199.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":497864,"topic_slug":"thrifty-nova-in-comp","display_username":"M","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":68890,"hidden":false,"trust_level":3,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Hachan Supporter"},"post_url":"/t/thrifty-nova-in-comp/497864/1","custom_user_title":"Hachan Supporter","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3579078,"name":"John Fogarty","username":"JohnFogarty","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/johnfogarty/{size}/267052_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-03T12:11:26.628Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOur coral gripper has been using a Nova with a \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCTRE\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Cross The Road Electronics\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e minion motor attached all season with no problems. The team at ThriftyBot has been helpful with any questions or feedback we contact them with.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e(We are sponsored by ThriftyBot but I intended on buying and testing this motor controller after seeing it at worlds last year either way.)\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-04-03T12:11:26.628Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":275,"readers_count":274,"score":70.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":497864,"topic_slug":"thrifty-nova-in-comp","display_username":"John Fogarty","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12688,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/thrifty-nova-in-comp/497864/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3579148,"name":"","username":"ConnorMasini","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/ac8455/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-04-03T14:13:32.525Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe used two this year and really liked them. The ability to use the runner board to prototype was great and the motors log their power output, which made debugging easier. We did have one issue with one of the motors where it was powered on and logging that it was trying to supply power, but the connected motor was not spinning. I contacted thrifty support about it and they were great and ready to send a replacement, but then it started working again. We aren’t entirely sure what caused our issue, but I am thinking it was something with the wiring on our side rather than with the nova itself (though we tried swapping a different Nova in to rule out wiring issues and it worked fine so I’m not entirely sure what our problem was).\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-04-03T14:13:32.525Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":193,"readers_count":192,"score":38.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":497864,"topic_slug":"thrifty-nova-in-comp","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":65822,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6616 Coach"},"post_url":"/t/thrifty-nova-in-comp/497864/3","custom_user_title":"6616 Coach","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3579150,"name":"Andrew Todd","username":"Andrew123ast","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew123ast/{size}/243883_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-03T14:16:03.707Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe bought a couple this season intending on using them.
